text: Hello All, Quick QUestion, Is it possible to convert a local scope module to global scope? As i made a mistake and now my module do not appear in the list of modules. Thank you :smile:
Are you working in a local environment? Not sure if you can do it in design manager. The scope is controlled in the meta.json file just change it from false to true.
Hey Brydon this is really hard to trouble shoot with just this code.
Correct, all you have to do is bring down the one folder and swap out that line
hey Thomas, what else can I send you to help out with this?
<@UTQQ4TXCH> here is an image of my code, if that helps
So looks like your group is set to repeat. If you preview the module do you see this?
If so it is because you set the group to repeater but didnâ€™t say how many times so by that definition there is none to display. If you add a one to min it should display.
